scripts.build:all: pnpm build:packages && pnpm build:example && pnpm build:website
scripts.build:packages: pnpm build:base && pnpm build:utils && pnpm build:modules && pnpm build:core && pnpm build:vue && pnpm build:editor-vue
scripts.deploy: pnpm build:all && shx cp -fr ./example/dist ./website/build/example/ && pnpm --filter=@ssml-editor/website deploy
scripts.promote:latest: pnpm dist-tag add @ssml-editor/base@$npm_package_version latest && pnpm dist-tag add @ssml-editor/utils@$npm_package_version latest && pnpm dist-tag add @ssml-editor/modules@$npm_package_version latest && pnpm dist-tag add @ssml-editor/core@$npm_package_version latest && pnpm dist-tag add @ssml-editor/vue@$npm_package_version latest && pnpm dist-tag add @ssml-editor/editor-vue@$npm_package_version latest
scripts.test:unpublish: pnpm unpublish @ssml-editor/base@$npm_package_version --force --dry-run && npm unpublish @ssml-editor/utils@$npm_package_version --force --dry-run && npm unpublish @ssml-editor/modules@$npm_package_version --force --dry-run && npm unpublish @ssml-editor/core@$npm_package_version --force --dry-run && npm unpublish @ssml-editor/vue@$npm_package_version --force --dry-run && npm unpublish @ssml-editor/editor-vue@$npm_package_version --force --dry-run
scripts.unpublish: pnpm unpublish @ssml-editor/base@$npm_package_version --force && npm unpublish @ssml-editor/utils@$npm_package_version --force && npm unpublish @ssml-editor/modules@$npm_package_version --force && npm unpublish @ssml-editor/core@$npm_package_version --force && npm unpublish @ssml-editor/vue@$npm_package_version --force && npm unpublish @ssml-editor/editor-vue@$npm_package_version --force
